page.topic: Adding a Button-Toggle to a ControlBar
page.description:
You can add a Button-Toggle to a ControlBar. Toggle buttons can either be two-state (switching between a true and a false state), or multi-state (each click advances to the next button state).
The video shows how the state of a Button-Toggle is used to control what action a button performs when clicked.

section.description: For a visual explanation on how the state of a Button-Toggle is used to control what action a button performs when clicked watch [this video] or follow the guide below.
